response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which holds significant value and potential for growth. Given its importance and the benefits it offers, we believe it would be a strategic asset for you. Considering its intrinsic value and market potential, we are offering this opportunity to you at a special price of $9,500. This represents an excellent opportunity to secure a valuable resource at a favorable rate. We trust that you will find this proposal compelling and look forward to discussing how this product can contribute to your business goals.", "product_price": 9500}
